title.en: Query a spline (time based) and wait for the result

hint.en: Calculates the Y value of a given spline depending on the current time of the day and waits until the calculation is done. You then can get the result in a 'then' flow card from the global drop token.

titleFormatted.en: Query [[spline]] based on the current time and wait for the result

title.en: Spline - create a spline in the app config and select it here
